projects.title: Qareb

projects.title: Scholar
projects.description: An all-inclusive digital school platform, spanning from primary to secondary education, offering educational videos, summaries, and student-authored motivation stories. It also empowers teachers to share their resources like textbooks, notes, and videos, while students can make affordable purchases via a virtual wallet replenished through minimal spending. Administrators continually enrich the platform with education-specific content. üíô

projects.title: Complex Fractal
projects.description: Developed a mobile app for Complex Fractal company, Complexfractal: Your financial markets companion. Unlock market complexities with fractal analysis through our mobile app. Leverage advanced algorithms and data tools to spot fractal patterns, predict price movements, and secure your trading success. Experience a user-friendly interface designed for all traders, from beginners to pros. Complexfractal: Your gateway to financial prosperity

projects.title: Sheikh Al-Souq
projects.description: During my position at Kerosene Tech, I played a pivotal role in the development of the main project, the 'Sheikh Al-Souq' multi-vendor marketplace app, a dynamic app brought to life by Kerosene Tech. This innovative platform redefines how businesses connect with customers. It allows you to showcase your name, number, and address and craft a personalized business gallery, all while retaining control over your content and the app's appearance. But that's just the beginning ‚Äì Sheikh Al-Souq, developed by Kerosene Tech, offers a complete electronic market with an affordable annual subscription, revolutionizing your online presence. Communication, shopping, and news sharing become effortless. Embrace cutting-edge technology to reshape your business.
